summary: This is a saved game for Lunar the Nord :) You start in Helgen after your bindings are taken off  <3 I hope you enjoy & Feel free to contact me with any questions
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone :) I'm Dani! This is my first upload to Skyrim Nexus & I hope you enjoy <3 I would love to be able to make mods and upload more of my saved characters so i hope you enjoy her <3 Feel free to leave comments and let me know what you think

Mods Required: zzzsimsskyrimhairccc (2-SIMS HAIRS) You must download This hair in order for it to work, You may find it on Google <3

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/? (Race Menu)
I used the unpb body type for my character

I want to also thank my husband for helping me create her :3
author: xdanikitty915x
